TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHasXmlNode

summary.span: 使类可以从当前上下文或位置返回 。

span.span: Enables a class to return an from the current context or position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IHasXmlNode` 接口提供了一个接口，该接口使类可以从当前上下文或位置返回一个 。The `IHasXmlNode` interface provides an interface that enables a class to return an from the current context or position. 它通过 对具有 节点的类进行操作来实现。It is implemented by objects that operate over classes that have nodes. 例如，如果 `XPathNavigator` 对象由 创建，则可以使用 方法返回表示导航器当前位置的 `XmlNode`。For example, if the `XPathNavigator` object is created by an , you can use the method to return the `XmlNode` representing the current position of the navigator. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `GetNode` 方法检索和修改所选节点。The following example uses the `GetNode` method to retrieve and modify the selected node. [!code-cpp[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/CPP/hasxmlnode.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/CS/hasxmlnode.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/VB/hasxmlnode.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `books.xml` 文件作为输入。The example uses the file `books.xml` as input. [!code-xml[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/XML/books.xml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlNode GetNode() cil managed
